website_summaries.verdict: This may be one of the best-looking phones you can buy for the price, but keep shopping for a faster, savvier device than the HTC Desire 626.
pros: The HTC Desire 626 has an attractive design and a compellingly low price
cons: Inconsistent image and video quality dog the Desire 626
Its stumbling performance drags the phone down, and weak automatic brightness make the handset's screen seem dim

customer_reviews.title: I'm gonna try to make this sweet and simple
customer_reviews.text: $150 for a phone that does what $600-700 can do. Only con for this phone is its battery life, compared to all my other phones this one drains the fastest but still last me 24hrs with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about a year ago - this is a great smart phone for the price, in fact if it were $250 it would be a great phone. Solid working, never had a problem and I have dozens of apps I use daily. Best phone so far and I've had $400 ones that didn't work as well. I have glass-shatter cover on screen and a good protector clam around it. Camera is great. Volume is good quantity and quality. I'll buy again if I destroy or lose this one.
customer_reviews.author: D Allison

customer_reviews.title: Overall fine phone
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a new phone, but didn't want to pay hundreds of dollars for one right now. This is what I settled on and mostly it's a great phone, it works just like any other android phone I have used. The reason I couldn't rate it any higher is that the phone crashes when I try to play games on it. Most other apps work fine on it, but it doesn't handle games very well. Anyway, if you are on a budget then this is a great option just don't expect it to do everything.
customer_reviews.author: kyle wiles

customer_reviews.title: Screen stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone but the screen randomly stopped working. Never was dropped or wet. You could hear texts still coming through but the screen stayed black. Tried recharging it and all kinds of things. 2 years later my kids stuck it on a charger to play with it and it started working again! Was excited to get my pictures off of it
customer_reviews.author: VIvian Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - lasted me 3 years - passed on to relative
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone. It worked well and offered all the features that I needed. I used it for about 3 years and when I upgraded I passed it on to my mother-in-law who now loves it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: A_Hall

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone so much after ordering iPhone 4 didn't work! Then I ordered a week later! Android X both those two didn't work! Then after those two I ordered HTC 626 and fell in love great phone
customer_reviews.author: Candycrushgirl

customer_reviews.title: okay that's fine I have the other one
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone today when I took the package out of the box I noticed it was taped shut. I didn't think anything of it. When I went to set it up the sim card was missing, okay that's fine I have the other one. Then turned it on to set it up then set it on the charger. It over heated in 5 minutes. The phone runs really slow, I shut it off to cool it down and now it's stuck on the Verizon loading screen. I asked for a refund and will be shipping it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone it works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone it works great, but I returned it because I got a better deal through Cricket on the same phone. I do not care for Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: drkstarfairy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. Hardly any lag time on wifi or data. The Verizon plan works in rural areas where other carriers don't. A wonderful upgrade for me.
customer_reviews.author: HolisticBabe

customer_reviews.title: Slow and DEAD
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for 1 month and 2 days and the entire time it has been very slow. Today it blinked off and will not turn back on. The charging light doesn't even light up when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Good phone and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good phone and battery life, phone calls are clear, good performance in all sorts of apps even heavy, price. Cons: no alternative roms so far as I know. GPS lags sometimes. camera is pretty average
customer_reviews.author: Yurii Bilousov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone! Still getting used to it, but it's sharp. Looks nice, feels nice, runs nice.
customer_reviews.author: MEGNOG

customer_reviews.title: Finally a phone I can understand
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this phone. I bought one just like it for my daughter for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Norma R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: but the phone is responsive and sound quality is nice.
customer_reviews.text: for a budget phone, this one works exceptionally well. It does feel a little light and made of plastic, but the phone is responsive and sound quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid This One
customer_reviews.text: Garbage Phone I bought the 612 for my daughter and a week later bought this one for myself because the 612 was so good. This was the next one available and thought it would be the same. Its Not.... This phone will not do anything right. It is the most clumsy unintelligent programing I have ever encountered. I have had it a month and am already replacing it. I will try to find a Desire 612, they seem a world better than the newer model. This damn 626 is just a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceThruMusic

customer_reviews.title: I got ripped off
customer_reviews.text: The dam thing went haywire weird screen nothing works right I used it for normal everyday use!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its so nice and its easy to use i like it so much...
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone for the price HANDS DOWN. I like it better than I did my iPhone. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayd Mackenzie Groce

customer_reviews.title: Glad the phone I got from amazon says I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad the phone I got from amazon says I need to sign in as the last synced account, I can't even use the phone now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HTC Desire 626
customer_reviews.text: It came fully protected, everything was here and work 100% fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like my phone. Phone was not damaged when received. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Felisia Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the phone freezes all the time and skips whenever videos or music play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hey, read mine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I've been an exclusive Samsung Galaxy owner for years, but their latest "Galaxy J1" was so bad, I don't know if I'll return to them again. But my HTC 526 replacement phone performed really well, so I figured I'd give the 626 a shot. Love it. No case, zero bending after about a month of use (I always keep it in my front pocket).
customer_reviews.author: Red Plammer

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this phone !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this phone. The first time was 2 years ago. It's such a great phone when I cracked my other one I decided to buy another !!! So worth the money best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great,  lightweight, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my Stepmother. It arrived on time, new in package with all of the manuals, charger, etc. We chose to use a prepaid Verizon plan, and the set up was very easy! We had everything working, including setting up a new account in about a half an hour. Seems to be a really great phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brown

customer_reviews.title: Poor product in general.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was a disappointment. It overheated and would shut off after just a few minutes of use. The battery saver made the phone overheat even more than without it, and the battery wouldn't last more than a couple hours with light use. This is not a review of the seller, but rather the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Horrible took forever to receive and had to pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible took forever to receive and had to pay for shipping once it finally got here and then the phone didn't work never again, it was not a new phone even though said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love the phone itself
customer_reviews.text: i love the phone itself. It's just the audio port does not work. I love to listen to music on the way to work but it just doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: my shoppe

customer_reviews.title: It's alright but it now has a permanent curve in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's alright but it now has a permanent curve in it from putting it into my pocket. If I had to do it over I would have stuck with a Droid.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Back of phone does not remove battery must be defective phone not even 2 no the old and won't power on. Very dissappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great and stylish...
customer_reviews.text: I went to turn it on today and it went to the android screen and then all the sudden went black, keep in mind this is the first time I've ever turned this device on. It will not go to the regular screen so I can set my phone up. I do not know what to do, I would like at least a replacement or something for this 150$ item I bought and it doesn't even work? I am disappointed. Update: Amazon replaced my item completely free of charge do to malfunctioning. My new phone works perfect. It is a great phone that can be compared to much nicer and expensive phones. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the phone.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the phone. It's faster than anything i've had previously and it keeps me connected and plays the few games I want to play. The only thing that keeps it from five stars is HTC programs that I'll probably never use. I'm also not using HD space on my computer to 'sync' this phone. Don't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dhewco@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Screen resolution is great. The volume is okay
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving this phone. Very lightweight. Screen resolution is great. The volume is okay, could use to be a bit louder. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: melissa ehlert

customer_reviews.title: i HAVE TO RESTART pretty often to get the main button in top left ...
customer_reviews.text: i HAVE TO RESTART pretty often to get the main button in top left to work. Like 2 times a day. And I keep it off at night. Someitmes slow. but good phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I love it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have enough storage, but on the other hand if it's not an iPhone it normally doesn't. Other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recomend it to buy
customer_reviews.text: I hate this phone , volume is really bad cant hardly hear it ring, just dont like it ,never had a htc phone before going back to a samsung .much better.ive had this phone only7 months .what can i do to get my money back or some money back from it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy treece

customer_reviews.title: not very much space but other then that a pretty good phone
customer_reviews.text: After a while it gets slow :/ also, not very much space but other then that a pretty good phone ! I've upgraded to the Google pixel 2 now.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: its a great phone. im satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this phone like two days ago and got it the next day. I love it. It's fast. The screen is great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry g.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this phone for my boyfriend and it is awesome. Great service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my boyfriend and it is awesome. Great service, screen display is colorful, takes vivid pictures, and we have not had Any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyM

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, four months later....not so much
customer_reviews.text: Bought four months ago and all of the sudden keeps shutting down and rebooting itself. Currently can't use it without it rebooting. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good loving my HTC! Its simple and to the point👍
customer_reviews.author: Nora M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and works amazing I'm extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lewis

customer_reviews.title: HTC comes through once again, under promises and over delivers. Highly recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Puchased as a gift for my wife, she's in love with this phone. Sure it's not the latest and greatest, or fastest phone to date, but it does what she needs and has a lot of great features. Easy to use, easy to expand the storage, and a definite upgrade to her previous phone, she raves and raves about this HTC.
customer_reviews.author: EricTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Good for young folks or non-gamers.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a high-power modern smartphone, this isn't it. BUT, for the price, you get a VERY capable mid-grade smart phone that allows internet browsing, youtube at low resolution and low-power gaming. Great for younger folks or people who are not power-users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HTC Desire 626 (Verizon LTE Prepaid)
product_meta.description: A Stand apart phone with a 5 inch display. Includes main and front cameras, and a performance speed that will allow easy browsing for the person on the go. Offers expandable memory and a Quad Core processor to enhance the user experience.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars92 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
